widesgatha shramikayan sandaha thalatha amathyawariya wisin handunwa dun rakshanayen ek pudgalayekugen dolar 40 bagin miliyana 1500 ka mudalak amathyawariya wisin komis lesa labagena athi bawa ada (07) pawathi madhya hamuwakadi parlimenthu manthri niroshan premarathna mahatha pawasiya. 2015 wasare agosthu 26 wani dina ema rakshana kramaya hadunwa dun athara edina sita me dakwa kalaya thula 263,307 ka pirisak shramikayan lesa widesgatha wi athi athara miliyana 1500 ka mudalak wancha kara aththe ema pirisen bawa manthriwaraya prakasha kaleya.

mema jana hamuwedi shri lanka nidahas pakshaye deshapalana nayakayin rasak sajith premadasa mahathata sahaya pala kirimata ekwuna.shri lanka nidahas pakshaye imbaulpe pradeshiya sabhawe sabhapathi sahi wipaksha nayaka lesa katayuthu kala indu gunathilaka, shri lanka nidahas pakshaye rathnapura disthrik sanwidhayaka saman indika, niwithagala pradeshiya sabha manthri dilip rajapaksha, shri lanka nidahas paksha aasana balamandalaye upa sabhapathi samantha kumarasiri,lekam wayidi nimal disanayaka saha palmadulla, imbaulpe, niwithagala, ahaliyagoda, kahawaththa yana pradeshawala shri lanka nidahas paksha apekshakayin da sajith premadasa mahathata sahaya pala kirimata ekwuna.
